info.title: Tofu-Maker API
info.description: RESTful Services to interact with Tofu-Maker runtime

tags.name: OpenTofuFromGitRepo
tags.description: APIs for running OpenTofu commands using OpenTofu scripts from a GIT Repo.

tags.name: Admin
tags.description: Admin services for managing the application.

tags.name: OpenTofuFromScripts
tags.description: APIs for running OpenTofu commands on the scripts sent via request body.

tags.name: OpenTofuFromDirectory
tags.description: APIs for running OpenTofu commands inside a provided directory.

post.description: Get OpenTofu Plan as JSON string from the list of script files provided

Get OpenTofu Plan as JSON string from the given directory.
